parameters.name: X-API-SECRET
parameters.description: The API secret as defined by the .env variable API_SECRET. Only needed for self hosted users, and only applicable on the login route.

parameters.name: X-API-TOKEN
parameters.description: The API token to be used for authentication

parameters.name: X-Requested-With
parameters.description: Used to send the XMLHttpRequest header

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Include child relations of the CompanyUser object, format is comma separated.
> ### **Note**: it is possible to chain multiple includes together, ie. include=account,token
```html Available includes: user company token account ```

user.summary: include=user will include the Cser object in the response

company.summary: include=company will include the Company object in the response

token.summary: include=token will include the Company Token object in the response

account.summary: include=account will include the Account object in the response

parameters.name: include_static
parameters.description:
This include will return the full set of static variables used in the application including:
  - Currencies
  - Countries 
  - Languages
  - Payment Types
  - Email Templatees
  - Industries

parameters.name: clear_cache
parameters.description:
Clears cache

Clears (and rebuilds) the static variable cache.
